reference.notes:
Elements References -------- ---------- Hf Ta W Re Os Ir Pt Au Hg: Dimitrios A. Pantazis, Xian-Yang Chen, Clark R. Landis, Frank Neese, All-electron scalar relativistic basis sets for third-row transition metal atoms, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 4, 908 (2008). La Ce Pr Nd Pm Sm Eu Gd Tb Dy Ho Er Tm Yb Lu: Dimitrios A. Pantazis, Frank Neese, All-electron scalar relativistic basis sets for the lanthanides, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 5, 2229 (2009). Ac Th Pa U Np Pu Am Cm Bk Cf Es Fm Md No Lr: Dimitrios A. Pantazis, Frank Neese, All-electron scalar relativistic basis sets for the actinides, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 7, 677 (2011).
Tl Pb Bi Po At Rn: Dimitrios A. Pantazis and Frank Neese, All-electron scalar relativistic basis sets for the 6p elements, Theor. Chem. Acc. 131, 1292 (2012).
